title.en: Merched y Wawr Pontarddulais Branch host an evening of Fasion
title.cy: Noson ‘Ffler Ffasiwn’ Merched y Wawr Pontarddulais a'r Cylch

description.en:
Noson ‘Ffler Ffasiwn’ Merched y Wawr Pontarddulais, gyda Marian, Siop Pleser, Pontarddulais, yn arddangos hetiau, Mai 25, 2012
Marian (Siop Pleser), Delyth Williams, Sheila Evans, Beti Williams, Kaye, Sandra Evans
Anne Roberts, Gwen Jones, Lorraine Rees, Kaye Williams, Enid Jones, Helen Evans, Marion Jones, Dorcas Walters
Tesni Lloyd, Nan Lloyd-Jones, Avril Davies, Merle Jones, Marjorie Jones
Mair Evans, Sheila Evans, Beti Williams, Jean Bolton
